heading: Elderfo dze nsa gu do hyɛ asɔfo na akyerɛkyerɛfo. Christ n’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 401–421.

verses.txt: Kwan a esuafo no a wɔfrɛɛ hɔn asɔr mu elderfo, faa do hyɛɛ asɔfo nye akyerɛkyerɛfo—
Ber a wɔbɔɔ mpaa maa Egya no wɔ Jesus Christ ne dzin mu wiei no, wɔdze hɔn nsa guu hɔn do see dɛ:

Wɔ Jesus Christ ne dzin mu mehyɛ wo sɔfo, (anaa sɛ ɔyɛ kyerɛkyerɛnyi a) mehyɛ wo ma abɛyɛ kyerɛkyerɛnyi, ama aakã nnuho nye bɔnfakyɛ a ɔnam Jesus Christ do, na egyina pintsinn wɔ gyedzi mu wɔ ne dzin mu dze akɔ ewiei. Amen.
Na dɛm kwan yi na wɔfaa do hyɛɛ asɔfo na akyerɛkyerɛfo, dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn n’akyɛdze nye frɛ a ɔdze frɛ adasamba no tse; na wɔnam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no tum a ɔwɔ hɔn mu no do dze hyɛɛ hɔn.
